title: Psi

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Crush a player's mind; they are roleblocked for tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a players mind is crushed, they will die the following night.
- After getting 1 kill with this, the target will be roleblocked the night they die as well.
- After getting 2 kills with this, your attacks now instantly kill the target.
- After getting 3 kills with this, both of your non-monkey neighbors will be roleblocked for the next 3 nights. They will not be informed.
- After getting 5 kills as Psi, you gain the Psionic Scream ability, allowing you to roleblock all non-monkeys (2 uses)
- You cannot spawn with Monkey(Magic)

desc:
Post 3560
*Ripples on the surface do not change the stillness of the lake*
